title: One word.. awesome
review:
I have ordered different cases for my oneplus x mobile till now, but not satisfied with any of them.  This cover fits my oneplus x perfectly, and is very aesthetic. 

Very durable product. I strongly recommend.

title: Delightful
review:
I will explain why i gave only 4 starts for this case
Pros:
- costs far less than the spigen case
-excellent stealthy look
-great design especially the groves in the top and bottom look like they are made of carbon fiber
-the holes for speaker at the bottom amptifies the sound a bit
-scratches on case cannot be sean easily
-it gives the phone a rectangular and stirdy feel
- definitely an upgrade as compared to the complementary rubber case

Cons:
-does not have a *tight fit as the phone comes out from the case on application of little pressure 
-the above point is bothering me as this *compromise the shoch resistance when the phone falls down

Finally, i would definitely recommend this product as it transforms the look of the phone and it feels like a military grade case.

title: BEST CASE FOR ONE PLUS X
review:
Before buying this case i was using Spigen armored case which had a simple and non protective design this case protect my on plus x mobile with bumpers in all four edge 
Pros -
* High Quality Tpu Case does not feel cheap at all
* Back is soft matte finish which looks and feels premium
* Full protection for One plus x So even if you drop your phone from a certain height your one plus x will be safe
* Bang for buck i know for a person like me spending 600 bucks for a case is lot but i needed a case with full protection with premium look as oneplus x is hell slippery.
*Buttons are covered having very good tectile feedback as comapred to Spigen Rugged Armor case.

title: Highly recommended
review: Best one to date for Oneplus X

title: Four Stars
review: A Bit loose.

title: worst low quality product
review:
The product was very low quality. It felt cheap, Moreover it didn't fit my oneplus x and was loose from one end. It does not look anything like the image provided and please don't be deceived by the looks in the image.
I got it for 449INR but not worth it. If its available for 200INR or less Then only go for it.
 The packaging was worst (as not at all expected from flipkart). And the delivery was also very inappropriate. In  time and place both, as i was called to pick it up elsewhere.
